message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_CASE_MANDATORY
message.locale: Please select at least one Product Delivery Case

message.name: ERR_RECOVERY_RATE_MANDATORY
message.locale: Either Recovery Rate fixed or Recovery Rate variable must be entered

message.name: ERR_LIABILITY_AMOUNT_MANDATORY
message.locale: Liability Amount must be greater than zero

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_START_DATE
message.locale: Start date cannot be a past date

message.name: ERR_CRA_SETOFF_DEDUCTION_START_DATE
message.locale: Start date cannot be a past date. Please enter current or a future date.

message.name: ERR_CRA_SETOFF_DEDUCTION_START_DATE_MODIFY
message.locale: Deduction start date cannot be before liability creation date.
